mapper.select: SELECT D.*,C.N_EVALUATION_PRICE, ABS(#{price}-D.N_PRICE) ABSOLUTE FROM EKB_T_TENDER_LIST D LEFT JOIN EKB_T_SECTION_INFO C ON D.V_BID_SECTION_ID = C.V_BID_SECTION_ID WHERE N_PRICE IN(SELECT B.N_PRICE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT N_PRICE FROM EKB_T_TENDER_LIST WHERE V_TPID = #{tpid} AND N_ENVELOPE_9 IN(1,2) ORDER BY ABS(#{price} - N_PRICE) LIMIT 5) B) AND D.V_BID_SECTION_ID =#{sid} AND C.V_TPID=#{tpid} AND D.N_ENVELOPE_9 IN(1,2) ORDER BY ABS(#{price} - D.N_PRICE),D.V_BIDDER_NO
